content: it s week 8 of the crochet along for a cause and this week we re making the ribbed baby beanie crochet pattern this cozy little hat is worked from the top down starting with a simple double_crochet crown once the crown is complete the bottom section is finished in a classic ribbing pattern using front post and back post double_crochet stitches the result is a stretchy snug and warm beanie perfect for keeping little heads toasty
